verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: finally] [V: met] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after months of trading juvenile barbs in an unprecedented fashion] .
President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un finally met in Singapore on Tuesday after months of [V: trading] [ARG1: juvenile barbs] [ARGM-MNR: in an unprecedented fashion] .
